title: Sure, here is a list of 20 articles up to 2023 that focus on goal awareness and the development of more intelligent conversational systems or agents
**"Towards Goal-Oriented Conversational Agents: A Survey"** - This article provides an extensive survey of goal-oriented conversational agents, discussing various techniques and methodologies
**"Dialogue State Tracking: A Neural Reading Comprehension Approach"** - This paper explores neural network approaches to dialogue state tracking, which is crucial for goal-oriented dialogue systems
**"End-to-End Learning of Task-Oriented Dialogs"** - This research discusses end-to-end learning frameworks for task-oriented dialogue systems, focusing on goal completion

**"Hybrid Code Networks: Practical and Efficient End-to-End Dialog Control with Supervised and Reinforcement Learning"** - This article presents a hybrid approach combining supervised and reinforcement learning for dialog control

**"Neural Approaches to Conversational AI: Question Answering, Task-Oriented Dialogues, and Social Chatbots"** - A comprehensive review of neural network approaches to various types of conversational AI, including goal-oriented systems
**"Learning to Actively Learn Neural Dialogue Systems"** - This paper investigates methods for improving dialogue systems through active learning techniques
**"A Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"** - This survey covers recent advancements in dialogue systems, including goal-oriented systems
Dialogue Systems, Conversational Agents, and Chatbots"** - An overview of conversational AI technologies, with a focus on goal-oriented dialogue systems
**"Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems for Automatic Diagnosis"** - This article discusses the application of task-oriented dialogue systems in the healthcare domain for automatic diagnosis
**"Transfer Learning for Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems: A Survey"** - This survey explores the use of transfer learning to improve the performance of task-oriented dialogue systems
**"Dialogue Management with Deep Reinforcement Learning"** - This paper presents deep reinforcement learning techniques for managing dialogues in goal-oriented systems

**"Goal-Oriented End-to-End Conversational Models with Profile Features in a Real-World Setting"** - This research focuses on integrating user profile features into goal-oriented conversational models
**"A Comprehensive Review on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and Future Directions"** - A detailed review of the state-of-the-art in dialogue systems, including goal-oriented approaches

**"Multi-Domain Dialogue State Tracking with Recursive Inference"** - This article discusses techniques for tracking dialogue states across multiple domains, which is essential for goal-oriented systems
**"Personalized Goal-Oriented Dialogues via Reinforcement Learning"** - This paper explores the personalization of goal-oriented dialogues using reinforcement learning techniques
**"Conversational Agents for Mental Health: A Review and Roadmap"** - While focusing on mental health, this review discusses goal-oriented conversational agents in this specific domain
**"Towards Universal Dialogue State Tracking"** - This research aims at developing universal dialogue state tracking methods applicable across various domains
**"Goal-Oriented Dialogue Policy Learning from Failures"** - This article investigates learning dialogue policies from failed interactions to improve goal completion rates
**"Task-Oriented Dialogue as Dataflow Synthesis"** - This paper presents a novel approach to task-oriented dialogue by framing it as a dataflow synthesis problem

**"Conversational Agents in E-commerce: A Systematic Literature Review"** - A review of conversational agents in the e-commerce sector, focusing on goal-oriented interactions to enhance user experience

These articles collectively cover a wide range of topics related to goal awareness and the development of more intelligent conversational agents, providing a solid foundation for understanding the current state and future directions of this field
